item.title: Visualising Global Rubbish
item.description: Where Rubbish Ends Up For this week’s #tidytuesday, I visualise the vast dataset of rubbish collected on the beaches all over the world. I will leave out the technical details (check the tweet / Rpubs post for code) of how I achieved this, but you can see the result in the tweet below. The data shows the headquarters for each company identified, and the lines show where the trash ended up.
